title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 50.3 - Grant limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 50.3 - Grant limits

State Regulations
(a) No single
grant for an export trade demonstration project providing technical assistance
shall exceed $100,000. (b) No
single grant for an export trade demonstration project providing financial
assistance shall exceed $200,000. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
50.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
